title: Backlog Attempts
content: What happens after we exhaust all our backlog attempts?

comments.body:
Depending on which campus you're from, they trap you within those walls for eternity making you worship the PESU overlords every minute of your day /s

Jokes aside, you have unlimited attempts.
You become a guard or an auto driver in PESU

I'm pretty sure there is a limit, I'm guessing it's 4 or 5 years after your original graduation year after which the college issues a certificate stating you're not fit for technical education.

Source: overheard the HoD talking to a parent.
Last time I read if u fail backlogs 3 consecutive times, they'll call ur parents and u could be in danger for rustication.
You won't graduate with your batch. You can continue to write backlogs...even after graduation year. Just keep an eye out for the registration dates on pesu.
